name: Whitney Buehler
title: Sales Account Manager
coverLetter:
Dear Hiring Manager,


While new to the cannabis industry, my resume clearly outlines that I am not new to retail sales. Working for high-line auto dealers for the past three years I've become accustomed to building relationships with high profile customers with high standards for both quality and time-management. My full retail experience spans over ten years in industries such as banking and retail fashion. My current position, while it provides an air of luxury, is lacking in providing me a sense of purpose and passion. I am seeking a position in the cannabis industry because beyond being a recreational customer, I am a strong supporter of cannabis use in healthcare in lieu of traditional pharmaceuticals and hope to one day become an integral player in the cause. I look forward to meeting you in person.


Sincerely,


Whitney Buehler
